attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

Copyright 2023 GAMLS. All rights reserved.

data.description: Welcome to the pinnacle of luxury living in Newton County's prestigious Riverstone Estates Community. This distinguished estate boasts an impressive 5 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, a true testament to opulence and exclusivity.    As you approach this magnificent property, the aura of sophistication and grandeur is unmistakable. Stepping through the exquisite front door, you are welcomed into a world of unparalleled elegance. The main floor sets the stage for a lifestyle defined by luxury, beginning with the master bedroom, a sanctuary of comfort and style. This haven includes a serene sitting area bathed in natural light, a trey ceiling adorned with intricate detailing, and a ceiling fan that provides gentle breezes - a testament to thoughtful design.    The master bathroom is a work of art, showcasing ceramic tile shower and flooring that exude luxury at every glance. A lavish garden tub invites you to unwind, while the generously sized walk-in closet ensures your wardrobe is impeccably organized.    The gourmet kitchen is a culinary masterpiece, equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, pristine countertops, and the convenience of a walk-in pantry that elevates your culinary endeavors to new heights.    The great room, a two-story marvel, is crowned by a magnificent stone, wood-burning fireplace with a seamless gas starter. This is where cherished moments and grand gatherings come to life, as family and friends gather around the warmth of the fire.    The dining room is a showcase of architectural excellence, adorned with graceful archways, meticulously crafted moldings, and exquisite details that transform every meal into a fine dining experience.    Ascending to the second level, a versatile loft area offers breathtaking views overlooking the great room below. This space serves as a canvas for your imagination.    Continuing on this level, you'll discover two spacious bedrooms on each side of the loft, connected by a thoughtfully designed jack-n-jill bathroom. Each bedroom boasts its own sink and ample walk-in closet space, ensuring that every member of the household enjoys both privacy and convenience.    But the luxuries don't end there. This remarkable estate includes additional rooms designed for your pleasure and convenience. A beautiful media room awaits for entertainment, a game room for leisure, and an in-home office for productivity. The fenced backyard offers a private oasis for outdoor activities and quiet enjoyment.    This residence is more than a home; it's an embodiment of luxury living. From the masterful design of the master suite to the gourmet kitchen and versatile living spaces, every aspect of this estate reflects an unwavering commitment to opulence and elegance. Welcome to a life of luxury in Newton County's Riverstone Estates Community, where the possibilities for indulgence and relaxation are boundless.
